single_crochet= single_crochet yarn looks best to me with a 3 mm hook double_crochet = double_crochet for this pattern just continue with border stitch = single_crochet through both loops your hook size and yarn used for the previous parts designs by iti 2 general instructions a mosaic blanket is worked from right to left cutting your yarn after every row throughout the pattern all single_crochet s are crocheted in the back loop of the previous row except the border stitches border stitches are crocheted through both loops all double_crochet s are crocheted in the front loop of the row two down so a double_crochet in row 5 is crocheted in the front loop of the corresponding stitch straight down from row 3 reading a chart a chart is read from right to left each box represents a stitch the border stitches are not visible in the chart although the chart is colored in to show the pattern every row is worked in one color when an -x appears in a box you need to work a
